thread.section_title: Play-Asia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Play-Asia.com | www.play-asia.com | 2 of 295
thread.title: John Atienza

author: John Atienza
title: John Atienza
text: Play-Asia got a wide selection of products, be it physical and digital. I got all of my order and the customer support were fast. There are also many kinds of payment and that helps me a lot. I don't have to worry if my other kind of payment was not accessible. The only downside I got is that there is an order that took 6 months to get, there maybe a conflict on the delivery or some kind but I got my order safely. But still, I can say that it is a trusted site for us Otaku/Gamers
